tool_description: API to access Kick.com streaming platform. Get streamer data, channel details, chat, and more. 2023
name: Kick.com API
title: Kick.com API

api_list.name: Get Messages
api_list.description:
Gets latest chat messages (including paged history). This endpoint requires Channel's ID. This ID can be obtained using Channels.GetChannelInfo endpoint (ID field).

Use returned Cursor to page through data history.

api_list.name: Get Sub-Categories
Get Sub-Category Clips
api_list.description: Get clips under specific Sub-Category. Paged request.

api_list.name: Get Sub-Categories List
api_list.description: Get simple list of all Sub-Categories in one call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/subcategories/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/subcategories/list"

headers = {

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Channel Links
Get Livestream Status
api_list.description: Gets Livestream status. Returns true/false based on running livestream on the channel.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/livestream/fusedchat/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/livestream/{username}/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Livestream Info
api_list.description:
Get information about currently running livestream.

Returns NoContent (204) if there is no livestream running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/livestream/fusedchat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/livestream/{username}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get User Details

api_list.name: Get Channel Clips
api_list.description:
Gets channel clips list and their details.

Each clip contains URL, who is creator, views and likes count, and more.

api_list.name: Get Channel Chatroom
api_list.description:
Gets channel chatroom information.

This includes chatroom ID, mode, message intervals, slow-mode, protection, and more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/channels/fusedchat/chatroom"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Channel Info
api_list.description:
Gets channel detailed information.

Including userId, banner image, categories, livestream data, chatroom settings, and more.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Username (also called Slug) of the channel

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/channels/fusedchat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kick-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
